title: blackguard
description: Using Nextjs with Tailwind, adding Hygraph (blog content) and MongoDB (everything else).

title: kiosk
description: Nextjs news API project with CRUD functions (Firebase).

title: Momentum
description: As a junior developer I took care of using Nuxt, combining it with Strapi, Google Auth, etc. I catered the company's content, and made sure everything didn't explote at the end of the day. Success was partial.

title: Postcards from Another Galaxy
description: Jump into the world of No Man's Sky.

title: тетрис
description: This is a personal one. A brief, concise love letter to this legendary Soviet game under the excuse of following (and ultimately tinkering and upgrading by include features like: several difficulty levels, all tetrominoes, and so on) a basic js gaming creation project. Game section is still receiving updates.

title: Carrington
description: The basic idea is to take a small budget app project and improve it by implementing a growing number of functionalities. Project is still going on.
